ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: ListInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: List initializations with 2 or more items must be formatted with each item on its own line
rule.description: List initializations with 2 or more items must be formatted with each item on its own line. Single item lists can be on a single line.
